about_the_game:
Note: This is the epilogue to Takumi's Main Story. For the best playthrough experience, we recommend having finished all three of Takumi's canon endings from his main story.

Several months after you helped close a cold case, you and Takumi are still working as partners on dangerous missions. With Valentine's Day coming up, you both resolve to try and relax for once and go on a proper date. Instead, you find yourselves getting tangled up in a new case breakthrough worth the interruption: finding out more about the Legendary Sorceress, Shizuka. Experience the sensual side of noir nights as you attend an upscale party rife with its own mysteries and reunite with those who helped you through your last escapade.
